trans-unit.source: For remote calls, implements a client channel that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.
trans-unit.target: 針對遠端呼叫，會實作使用 TCP 通訊協定以傳輸訊息的用戶端通道。

trans-unit.source: Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, computers or application domains).
trans-unit.target: 通道會傳輸訊息跨越遠端界限 （例如，電腦或應用程式定義域）。

trans-unit.source: The TcpClientChannel class transports messages using the TCP protocol.
trans-unit.target: TcpClientChannel 類別傳輸使用的 TCP 通訊協定的訊息。

trans-unit.source: Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls.
trans-unit.target: 通道會使用.NET Framework 遠端處理基礎結構來傳輸遠端呼叫。

trans-unit.source: When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel.
trans-unit.target: 當用戶端的遠端物件的呼叫時，呼叫會序列化成訊息是由用戶端通道所傳送和接收的伺服器通道。

trans-unit.source: It is then deserialized and processed.
trans-unit.target: 然後還原序列化，並處理。

trans-unit.source: Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel.
trans-unit.target: 任何傳回的值是由伺服器通道傳送，並由用戶端通道接收。

trans-unit.source: To perform additional processing of messages on the client side, you can specify an implementation of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider> interface through which all messages processed by the TcpClientChannel are passed.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行額外處理的訊息用戶端，您可以指定的實作<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider>介面透過 TcpClientChannel 所處理的所有訊息會都傳遞。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider>

trans-unit.source: By default, the TcpClientChannel class uses a binary formatter to serialize all messages.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，TcpClientChannel 類別會使用二進位格式子，將所有訊息都序列化。

trans-unit.source: A TcpClientChannel object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingConfiguration.Configure%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method) or programmatically (by passing a <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection to the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel.%23ctor%2A> constructor).
trans-unit.target: TcpClientChannel 物件具有相關聯的組態屬性可以設定在執行階段組態檔中 (藉由叫用靜態<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingConfiguration.Configure%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法) 或以程式設計方式 (藉由傳遞<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>集合<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel.%23ctor%2A>建構函式)。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.RemotingConfiguration.Configure%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a list of these configuration properties, see the documentation for <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這些組態屬性的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel.%23ctor%2A>文件

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The configuration properties of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel> instance returned by this constructor are all set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 組態屬性<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel>這個建構函式所傳回的執行個體設定為其預設值。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel"></xref> class with the specified configuration properties and sink.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel"></xref>具有指定之組態屬性和接收器的類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe).
trans-unit.target: 如需通道組態屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[通道和格式器組態屬性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)。

trans-unit.source: If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數`null`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection that specifies values for configuration properties to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>指定之通道所使用的組態屬性值的集合。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"></xref> implementation to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IServerChannelSinkProvider"> </xref>通道所使用的實作。

trans-unit.source: A configuration property was incorrectly formatted.
trans-unit.target: 組態屬性的格式不正確。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel"></xref> class with the specified name and sink.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel"></xref>具有指定的名稱和接收器的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel.ChannelName%2A> property by using the `name` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel.ChannelName%2A>屬性使用`name`參數。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel.ChannelName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要註冊一個以上的通道，每個通道都必須具有唯一的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不需要接收功能，設定`sinkProvider`參數`null`。

trans-unit.source: The name of the channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"></xref> implementation to be used by the channel.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider"> </xref>通道所使用的實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前通道的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Every registered channel has a unique name.
trans-unit.target: 每個已註冊的通道都有唯一的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetChannel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 名稱用來擷取特定的通道呼叫<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetChannel%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ChannelServices.GetChannel%2A>時

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> instance that contains the name of the channel.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>執行個體，其中包含通道的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority of the current channel.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前通道的優先權。

trans-unit.source: The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels.
trans-unit.target: 優先順序控制的順序中的競爭的用戶端連線到指定的端點。較高的優先順序通道連線之前較低優先順序通道。

trans-unit.source: The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 預設優先權為 1。允許使用負值的優先順序。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.
trans-unit.target: 整數，代表指派給通道的優先權。

trans-unit.source: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回將訊息傳遞至指定的 URL 或通道資料物件的通道訊息接收。

trans-unit.source: The CreateMessageSink method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object.
trans-unit.target: CreateMessageSink 方法會傳回將訊息傳遞至指定的 URL 或通道資料物件的通道訊息接收。

trans-unit.source: If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink.
trans-unit.target: 如果`uri`參數是`null`，`remoteChannelData`接收做為目標。

trans-unit.source: Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 可能是`url`或`remoteChannelData`參數可以是`null`，但非兩者。

trans-unit.source: The URL to which the new sink delivers messages.
trans-unit.target: 新的接收將訊息傳遞的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The channel data object of the remote host to which the new sink will deliver messages.
trans-unit.target: 新的接收應該將訊息傳遞的遠端主機的通道資料物件。

trans-unit.source: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法傳回時，包含將訊息傳遞至指定的 URL 或通道資料物件的新通道訊息接收的 URI。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.
trans-unit.target: 通道訊息的接收，將訊息傳遞至指定的 URL 或通道資料物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether the current channel is secure
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定布林值，指出目前的通道是否安全

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current instance is secure.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出目前的執行個體是否為安全。

trans-unit.source: Extracts the channel URI and the remote well-known object URI from the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的 URL 擷取通道的 URI 以及遠端的已知物件的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The URL from which to extract the URIs.
trans-unit.target: 要從中擷取 Uri URL。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a <xref:System.String> instance that holds the URI of the remote well-known object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含<xref:System.String>遠端的已知物件的 URI 會保存的執行個體。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: The channel URI.
trans-unit.target: 通道 URI。
